Package zebra4j.fact

Interface Fact

All Known Implementing Classes:
BothTrue, CommutativeFact, Different, NearbyHouse
public interface Fact
A fact given as a clue to the players

Facts are used as members of sets so they must implement equals and hashCode correctly.

Facts are typically relationships between attributes or the people that have them. When implementing a fact about two attributes, consider extending CommutativeFact.

    • appliesTo

      boolean appliesTo​(BasicPuzzle puzzle)
      Parameters:
      puzzle - required
      Returns:
      if the fact is relevant to the given puzzle e.g. if the fact is a relationship between attributes and the puzzle contains all of them

    • attributeTypes

      Collection<AttributeType> attributeTypes()
      Collect the types of the attributes referenced by the fact
      Returns:
      a non-empty list if the fact is a relationship between attributes, empty otherwise
